member.param: Option: 1 = merge all sort fields, 2 = merge orderBy fields only

member.name: M:ASPNETMaker2023.Models.defa.SqlDistinctFactor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct SQL Distinct factor - ACCESS y: IIf(Year(FieldName)=1996,1,0) q: IIf(DatePart(""q"",FieldName,1,0)=1,1,0)) m: (IIf(DatePart(""m"",FieldName,1,0)=1,1,0))) others: (IIf(FieldName=val,1,0))) - MSSQL y: (1-ABS(SIGN(Year(FieldName)-1996))) q: (1-ABS(SIGN(DatePart(q,FieldName)-1))) m: (1-ABS(SIGN(DatePart(m,FieldName)-1))) d: (CASE Convert(VarChar(10),FieldName,120) WHEN '1996-1-1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - MySQL y: IF(YEAR(FieldName)=1996,1,0)) q: IF(QUARTER(FieldName)=1,1,0)) m: IF(MONTH(FieldName)=1,1,0)) SQLITE y: (CASE CAST(STRFTIME('%Y',FieldName) AS INTEGER) WHEN 1996 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) q: (CASE (CAST(STRFTIME('%m',FieldName) AS INTEGER)+2)/3 WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) m: (CASE CAST(STRFTIME('%m',FieldName) AS INTEGER) WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) - PostgreSQL y: IF(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM FieldName)=1996,1,0)) q: IF(EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM FieldName)=1,1,0)) m: IF(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FieldName)=1,1,0)) Oracle y: DECODE(TO_CHAR(FieldName,'YYYY'),'1996',1,0) q: DECODE(TO_CHAR(FieldName,'Q'),'1',1,0) m: DECODE(TO_CHAR(FieldName,'MM'),LPAD('1',2,'0'),1,0)

member.name: M:ASPNETMaker2023.Models.defa.GroupValue(ASPNETMaker2023.Models.defa.ReportField,System.Object)
member.summary: Get group value - Get the group value based on field type, group type and interval - fldType: field type * 1: numeric, 2: date, 3: string - gt: group type * numeric: i = interval, n = normal * date: d = Day, w = Week, m = Month, q = Quarter, y = Year * string: f = first nth character, n = normal - intv: interval

member.name: F:ASPNETMaker2023.Models.defa.ChartTypes.Types
member.summary:
Supported chart types
Format - [chart_id, [normal_chart_name, scroll_chart_name]] chart_id - abnn **id = chart_id in previous version - a: 1 = Single Series, 2 = Multi Series, 3 = Stacked, 4 = Combination, 5 = Financial, 6 = Other - b: 0 = 2D, 1 = 3D - nn: 01 = Column, 02 = Line, 03 = Area, 04 = Bar, 05 = Pie, 06 = Doughnut, 07 Pareto - nn: 91 = Marimekko, 92 = Zoom-line - nn: 99 = Candlestick, 98 = Gantt
